bibl.title: Ptolemaic Mummy Stuffings: An Intriguing Ptolemaic Scholar's Text in the Yale Collection (P.CtYBR 5018).
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 5018. Acquired in 1998. Provenance unknown, late 3rd / early 2nd c. BC. Series of entries, each with three elements: (1) an ordinal number; (2) the lemma, apparently excerpted from an unknown prose text; (3) literary examples or verbatim quotations (Odyssey 11, two trimeter lines from an unknown tragedy or tragedies). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: William A. Johnson, Ptolemaic Mummy Stuffings: An Intriguing Ptolemaic Scholar's Text in the Yale Collection (P.CtYBR 5018).
ArchPF 62 (2016) pp. 1-19, 2 figg. n./bl. et coul.
